bibl.title: Some Thoughts on the Subject "'State' and 'Church' in Ptolemaic Egypt".
Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond
bibl.author: HUSS, Werner

bibl.note: De la coopération du clergé égyptien avec l'État (cf. notamment les décrets de synodes) et de son opposition, sous diverses formes, à l'État (par ex., l'Oracle du Potier).
HUSS Werner, Some Thoughts on the Subject "'State' and 'Church' in Ptolemaic Egypt".
Janet H. JOHNSON (Ed.), Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond = SAOC. 51 (Chicago, 1992) pp. 159-163.
